summary: A Mature-Looking Female Preset for you all.
descriptionHtml:
[left]Hello All! this'll be the first file I'll upload here in nexus ( not even a mod... just a preset ) anyways,
Mods needed:

[list=1]
[*]RaceMenu by Expired6978
[*]UNP body by Dimon99
[*]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio by Ousnius and Caliente ( I used UUNP morphs that's why. )
[*]KS Hairdos by Kalilies OR
[*]KS Hairdos HDT by Stealthic Khaos ( In the Preset, I used the HDT one, and no, there is no non-HDT preset I made, you can do it yourself anyway. )
[*]Better Female Eyebrows by Kalilies
[*]Lind's Human Eyes by Lind001
[*]Empyrean War Paints by Empyrean 42 ( Required if you want to use the Paint in here face, if you don't, read further, I'll say it later )
[*]THEHAGS Privat Tattoos for UNP by THEHAG ( same as the one above . )
[/list]
Installation:
Go to your Skyrim Directory, for easy access, Right - Click on your Skyrim Shortcut and choose "Open File Location"
once there, go to Data/ SKSE/ Plugins/ Chargen, and you're done.

Now then, the Tats, you want them removed? go to "Face Paint" section in the Sliders then set all the colors to zero ( it'll make it transparent, so that the skin will once again be visible. ) OR if you want it in default, choose the First texture in the "Texture" sections of the "Face Paint" section, then do the first step to remove the colors. ( I think this'll also fix the " whole body is Colored " bug. )
[/left]Credits:[list=1]
[*]RaceMenu by Expired6978
[*]UNP Body by Dimon99
[*]Lady Horus Tera Armor by Lady Horus
[*]Dark Souls Weapons by iz
[*]Halo's Poser by Halofarm
[*]HDT maid outfit by ColonolNutty
[/list]
author: Adam Jensen
